Posts.Content: Dec 14, 2008 02:11AM Rarity wrote: As a teenager who has gone through many medical scares in the past couple months, one of the most important things you can do is to spend time each day with your son. If you are not too tired take him for a walk and ask him how his day was. His lack of tears will probably not last, I remember that after my MRI my mom held me for an hour while I cried because I was very scared. This is not going to be an easy thing for either of you and I wish you the best! ClaraÂ
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed, question re: children, please guide me... gcpommom Rarity
